subdisciplines.name: Computational Mathematics
subdisciplines.description: The development of algorithms, mathematical models and numerical methods to solve practical problems in science, engineering, and industry.

subdisciplines.name: Mathematical Modeling
subdisciplines.description: The process of creating a mathematical representation of a real-world system or phenomenon to provide insights or make predictions.

subdisciplines.name: Operations Research
subdisciplines.description: The application of advanced analytical methods to make better decisions in complex situations.
